p: All activity assays were conducted with at least three repetitions, with the results given as mean Â± standard deviations (SD). The half-maximal inhibitory concentrations (IC 50 values) of antiglycation agents and AR inhibitors were calculated through either linear regression or logarithmic analysis, which should satisfy each regression coefficient with more than 0.95 (r 2 > 0.95). The statistical analyses of the bioactivities of the separated compounds were carried out using SPSS software (Version 25; IBM, New York, NY, USA). A significant difference exists when p < 0.05 (LSD test).
